# Methodology and evaluation

# Class methodolody

--

- Master classes

--

- Case studies and articles

--

- Mid-term exams (Nov & Dec)

--

- Final essay: marketing plan

--

- Final evaluation (Jan & Feb)

---

# Evaluation

--

- Master classes: evaluated with tests and an essay. The latter will assess critical, creative and communicative competences.

--

- Seminars and workshops: class participation, critical eye and proactivity. Observation and communication skills.  

--

- Individual self-study: mid-term tests in the computer lab.  

--

- Group self-study: presentation of group work.  

---

# Papers & projects

--

The group projects will consist of a report and an oral presentation, possibly including audiovisual support.

To be assessed:

--

- Theory applications.

--

- Teamwork skills: initiative, coordination, workload distribution.  

--

- Communication and time control.  

--

- Language: written and spoken.  

--

- Abstraction capacity: essential elements of the report.  

---
